title: Davis Ceramics
description: From her studio in the Hudson Valley, ceramicist Mary Anne Davis strives to create ethical and original artworks that are both pleasurable and usable. Each piece is a singular work of art, handmade and decorated by Davis and a team of fellow potters from her community who produce sustainable, useful, and beautiful artwork. Food safe, hand wash. 8 in L x 8 in W x .5 in H.
